A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Yep\, it's as bad as I thought it would be.  I wasn't a fan of the Phantom Menace\, but I only thought that that was a bad Star Wars film.  This atrocity is not a Star Wars film.  This is a really bad movie\, but it ain't no Star Wars movie.\n\nI couldn't stand any of thenew characters.  The asian girl is this generation's Jar Jar.
